labels.label: Connect to this from "Enrich Data" Processor Group Test using a Kafka consumer - /usr/hdp/current/kafka-broker/bin//kafka-console-consumer.sh --zookeeper localhost:2181 --topic device_event_avro
Note: Input Port to which Mahesh's processor will connect to
Note: 1. The Hortonworks schema registry needs to be started first and then the other two controller services 2. The URL for the schema may need to change once deployed to the demo environment.
Note 1. This processor updates the schema name. Make sure to update the schema name here if there are changes to the schema name or a new schema needs to be used.
Note: 1. Kafka broker configuration needs to change in the new environment. 2. The topic name may need to change as SAM requires the topic name to be the same as the Avro schema name.
Sample test flow file generated to test the flow. Mahesh can see the flow file attributes here as output from his processor

entry.value: Health Sciences Center Emergency Services 5 Theater A A-522

DeviceGUID, DeviceId, PatientId, PatientName, DiagnosisDescription, HealthProviderName, Location, DoctorEmail, SampleDuration, Respiration, PulseRate, BloodPressureSystolic, BloodPressureDiastolic, BodyTemperature, TransmissionTimestamp
